hot.name: webpack/webpack
hot.description: A bundler for javascript and friends. Packs many modules into a few bundled assets. Code Splitting allows for loading parts of the application on demand. Through "loaders", modules can be CommonJs, AMD, ES6 modules, CSS, Images, JSON, Coffeescript, LESS, ... and your custom stuff.

hot.name: webpack/webpack-dev-server
hot.description: Serves a webpack app. Updates the browser on changes. Documentation https://webpack.js.org/configuration/dev-server/.

hot.description: üê† Babel is a compiler for writing next generation JavaScript.

hot.name: stylelint/stylelint
hot.description: A mighty, modern linter that helps you avoid errors and enforce conventions in your styles.

hot.name: hiroppy/the-sample-of-module-bundler
hot.description: You will know how to make a javascript bundler
